summary.overview: This JCL compiles and links a COBOL program that integrates CICS transaction processing, IMS database operations, and MQ message queuing capabilities. The job creates an executable load module for processing online transactions while accessing IMS databases and handling MQ messages.
business_functions: Translate CICS commands in COBOL source code for transaction processing compatibility
Compile COBOL program with business logic for IMS message queue processing
Prepare linkage control statements for program entry point and module naming
Prepare CICS interface integration statements for transaction processing
Prepare MQ interface integration statements for message queue operations
Link compiled program with CICS, IMS, and MQ runtime libraries to create executable load module

IMSMQCMP.jcl.program_overview: COBOL program that processes IMS message queue transactions with CICS integration

datasource_summary.name: CICS System Load Module Library (CICSTS.CICS.SDFHLOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains CICS system load modules required for CICS program compilation and execution

datasource_summary.name: Application Source Code Library (AWS.M2.COBOL.SRC(IMSMQPGM))
datasource_summary.function: Contains the COBOL source code for programs that integrate CICS, IMS and MQ functionality

datasource_summary.name: COBOL Compiler Library (IGY.SIGYCOMP.V63)
datasource_summary.function: Contains COBOL compiler load modules for program compilation

datasource_summary.name: Language Environment Runtime Library (CEE.SCEERUN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains Language Environment runtime modules required for program execution

datasource_summary.name: Additional Language Environment Runtime Library (CEE.SCEERUN2)
datasource_summary.function: Contains additional Language Environment runtime modules for extended program functionality

datasource_summary.name: Language Environment Sample Copybook Library (CEE.SCEESAMP)
datasource_summary.function: Contains Language Environment sample copybooks and include members

datasource_summary.name: CICS COBOL Copybook Library (CICSTS.CICS.SDFHCOB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains CICS COBOL copybooks and include members for CICS program development

datasource_summary.name: MQ COBOL Copybook Library (MQ.SCSQCOBC)
datasource_summary.function: Contains MQ COBOL copybooks for message queue operations and integration

datasource_summary.name: Application COBOL Copybook Library (AWS.M2.COBCOPY)
datasource_summary.function: Contains application-specific COBOL copybooks for business logic implementation

datasource_summary.name: MQ Load Module Library (MQ.SCSQLOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains MQ load modules and stub programs for message queue functionality

datasource_summary.name: System Load Module Library (SYS1.LINKLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains standard system load modules required for program execution

datasource_summary.name: Language Environment Link Editor Library (CEE.SCEELKED)
datasource_summary.function: Contains Language Environment link editor modules for program linking

datasource_summary.name: IMS System Load Module Library (IMS.SDFSRESL)
datasource_summary.function: Contains IMS system load modules for IMS program integration and execution

datasource_summary.name: Application Load Module Library (AWS.M2.CICSLOAD(IMSMQPGM))
datasource_summary.function: Stores the final executable program that integrates CICS, IMS and MQ functionality for business operations

flowchart TD
